entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h then light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
